page.title: 18Religion
page.content:
Today we went to Ratby church to talk to the vicar.We found out that about 3,000 people live in Ratby and about 5% of that number go to church.There is also a Methodist church,a Muslim family and a West Indian family who organise their own services which are much livlier than ours.Catholic people go by mini-bus to their church at New Parks. We looked at the parish registers and saw that in 1984 there were 15 weddings in the church.There were 21 funerals.We found out that very few people die under the age of 50 these days. {Jonathan A.
In Kirby Muxloe there are two churches.The Parish church and the Free church.Both are well attended. People come from further afield to attend the free church(evangelical)
